004package mkt.model;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import mkt.Model;
008
009/** Aproximations model */
010public class Appr {
011  /**
012   * Constructor.
013   * @return InvModel
014   */
015  public static Model mk () {
016    return new Model(
017      "APRX",
018      "Aproximaciones sucesivas",
019      new String[]{"Inicio", "Aproximación"},
020      new int[]{Model.PERC_PARAM, Model.PERC_PARAM},
021      (closes, params) -> {
022        double start = params[0];
023        double upStart = 1 + start;
024        double downStart = 1 - start;
025        double incr = params[1];
026        double[] cls0 = closes[0];
027        int ndates = closes.length;
028        int ncos = cls0.length;
029
030        double[][] allRefs = new double[ndates][ncos];
031        boolean[] isSolds = new boolean[ncos];
032        Arrays.fill(isSolds, false);
033        double[] refs = new double[ncos];
034        for (int i = 0; i < ncos; ++i) refs[i] = cls0[i] * downStart;
035
036        allRefs[0] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
037        for (int idate = 1; idate < ndates; ++idate) {
038          double[] closesR = closes[idate];
039
040          for (int ico = 0; ico < ncos; ++ico) {
041            double c = closesR[ico];
042            double rf = refs[ico];
043
044            if (isSolds[ico]) {
045              if (c > rf) {
046                isSolds[ico] = false;
047                refs[ico] = c * downStart;
048              } else {
049                refs[ico] = rf - (rf - c) * incr;
050              }
051            } else {
052              if (c < rf) {
053                isSolds[ico] = true;
054                refs[ico] = c * upStart;
055              } else {
056                refs[ico] = rf + (c - rf) * incr;
057              }
058            }
059          }
060          allRefs[idate] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
061        }
062        return allRefs;
063      }
064    );
065  }
066}
